snippet: Texas’ political season is interrupted every two years by five months of legislating, some of which has as much to do with politics and elections as with governing.
lead_paragraph: Texas’ political season is interrupted every two years by five months of legislating, some of which has as much to do with politics and elections as with governing.

headline.seo: In Texas Legislative Session, Lawmaking Disrupts Politics
headline.main: Once Again, Legislating Will Disrupt Politicking
headline.print_headline: Once Again, Legislating Will Disrupt Politicking
